Mantella


(Mantella starts banging the walls in with her slash claws, when=
 she wakes up...She realizes it was all a dream...She looks around...She wa=
s outside where the Destron base once was...She frowns and crys. She wipes =
her face off and smiles. Even tough leaving the Preds was wise, joining the=
 Destrons was not a good thing to do. She didn't know it would turn out lik=
e this. She sits there alone.)

(She thought about her life, how she saved =
Quickstrikes ass 2 times before, about how she was ignored by that fart Meg=
atron, about how she never knew what happened to Drazom after she rejected =
him, about how she never knew what happened to Virgo, about how she left th=
e Preds with Shredder for the Destrons, about how she sold herself and was =
updated for battle purposes, about how she wasn't used in battle, about how=
 she wanted to impress Magmatron, about how she tried her best to get love =
from Shredder or at least to have a relationship involving no romance, but =
instead was loathed and rejected for no reason just so her pain could be tu=
rned to fun, and about how The Destrons left her for death....She would nev=
er take no interests in a bot again...She stands up, turning and walking of=
f....)
